name: entra-remove-oauth2-permission-grants
title: CLI - Remove OAuth2 permission grants (granted for users) for a specified Entra ID application registration
shortDescription: Find all OAuth2 permission grants that have been assigned to a specified application registration and are granted to user(s).
longDescription: Find all OAuth2 permission grants that have been assigned to a specified application registration and are granted to user(s). It also provides the option to remove all permissions or permission consents that have been granted by an administrator.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
